raw_body: BANDULA RAMBUKWELLA (Formerly Unilever,​ Maharaja,​ Delmage Forsyth and Link Natural). Loving son of late Susiri Rambukwella & Wimala Asmadale,​ brother of late Lalitha,​ Tissa,​ Malini,​ Visaka,​ Senaka,​ beloved husband of Sarojini (nee Udabage),​ precious father of Banduka and Chammika,​ father-in-law of Harendra Withanage & Manjalee Welagedara,​ loving grandfather of Vivanya,​ Sandev & Omaya.082646
